```{r}
df_list=list(birthweight,demo,activity,diet,food_sec,body)
data=df_list%>%reduce(inner_join,by='SEQN')
data=subset(data, select=c(SEQN,ECQ020,ECD070A,ECD070B,RIAGENDR,RIDAGEYR,RIDAGEMN,FSDHH,BMXWT))
colnames(data)=c("SEQN","smoke","birth_pounds","birth_ounces","sex","age","age_months","food_sec","weight")
```
